creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
inscription: 大正六年一月 {Taishō rokunen ichigatsu} (January 1917)
markings: red artist's seal: 深水 {Shinsui}; on back, label: No. 24—Edition limited to –50– copies only. S. Watanabe Tokyo | round seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe}; on back, red seal 摺刷五十枚限の内　第二十四番 {shūsatsu gojū mai kagiri no uchi, dai nijūyon ban} (the limited printing of 50, number 24)
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
text: A half-clad young woman is wringing out a towel. The title of the print suggests that she is leaving the bath.
title: After the Bath
